resources.string: VLC => Media => Open Network Stream (Ctrl+N) => Network Protocol => Paste (Ctrl+V)

StreamShare is a lightweight tool for managing RTSP links to streaming content. Share with your laptop or friends. Especially useful when the video automatically redirects you to some kind of video player.
1. On phone, find a webpage which links to RTSP stream. Can be a streaming TV channel, radio station or camera feed
2. Click link and pick StreamShare \n3. Share it via email to your PC
-Use a media player such as VLC by pasting link starting with rtsp:// \n-You may even be able to record your stream.
